name: G-Ball (itch)
description:
This is a simple game created by myself in Java processing 3x so the format is .exe 

The concept of the game is that you controll a ball, your goal is to reach the green ball

but there are obstacles randomly generated, there is gravity and, most important of

all, if you touch the walls, you die.

This game is in developpment; it isn't complete, it is playable but lack of options.

if you want full version, wait 2-3 weeks and it should be okay for beta version.
